short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stats for the Twitch's chat. To access the stats panel, just click the settings icon in the video player, then go to `Advanced`.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this new panel, you'll have the amount of messages per second, and the amount of messages sent during the last 10 seconds.
